DataElement.preferredName: Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation Intervention or Procedure Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date following a lumpectomy on which a technique to deliver highly effective doses of radiation over a reduced treatment time occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation Intervention or Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Radiation therapy following lumpectomy, that uses highly effective doses of radiation over a reduced treatment time. Radiation may be admistered by brachytherapy, or through external radiation beam techniques._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Radiation therapy following lumpectomy, that uses highly effective doses of radiation over a reduced treatment time. Radiation may be admistered by brachytherapy, or through external radiation beam techniques.

Concepts.definition: Radiation therapy following lumpectomy, that uses highly effective doses of radiation over a reduced treatment time. Radiation may be administered by brachytherapy, or through external radiation beam techniques.

Property.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: MCL:Molecular and Cellular Characterization of Screened Lesions
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 3/14/22 jk Shared UCSF ISPY-2 DEC, released as part of quarterly content review and prior reviews with SMEs.  5/14/19 jk created for Breast Radiation Therapy module.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
